title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Centennial Trail, South Dakota
content:
Photo submitted by KD Antonacci, â€œHubs and I have both biked for 20+ years. In 2017 we decided to buy a travel trailer so we could widen our experience and travel in comfort. We pick a destination then find places in between to stay and bike. We have found some great hidden gems this way.
